query:
UPDATE web_article SET
                title = $1,
                description = $2,
                url = $3,
                text = $4,
                html = $5,
                timestamp = DATE($6),
                summary = $7,
                is_new_technology_related = $8,
                is_new_product_related = $9,
                is_new_academic_paper_related = $10,
                is_ai_related = $11,
                is_security_related = $12,
                is_it_related = $13,
                status = $14
            WHERE article_id = $15
